definition: sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛
to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部绞痛，呕吐和腹泻，通常是血便。

sentences.english: EA at Neiguan(PC 6) has a good regulative action on stable angina pectoris.
sentences.chinese: 电针内关穴对稳定型心绞痛具有良好的调整作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the therapeutic efficacy of diclofenac sodium suppositories in renal colic caused by calculus.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解双氯芬酸钠栓剂对结石性肾绞痛的治疗效果。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of Nuodikang capsule(NDKC) in treating angina of CHD.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察诺迪康胶囊治疗冠心病心绞痛的临床疗效。

sentences.english: In acute bowel obstruction, patients have colicky abdominal pain with vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 急性肠梗阻的病人出现腹部绞痛和呕吐。

sentences.english: This vents the bottle and allows your baby to feed continuously, reducing the risk of wind and painful colic.
sentences.chinese: 让您的宝宝可以不断进食，降低吸入风及绞痛的风险。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the medical effect of Yueanxin Injection used to treat angina pectoris.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价悦安欣注射液对心绞痛的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects and mechanism of variant angina pectoris treated with Nifedipine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨硝苯吡啶对变异型心绞痛的疗效及机制。

sentences.english: This to me is still the best animal model of unstable angina pectoris .
sentences.chinese: 这是我做过的最满意的不稳定心绞痛动物模型。

sentences.english: Peppermint is frequently used to allay nausea and vomiting and will relieve the pain of colic.
sentences.chinese: 欧薄荷常被用作缓和反胃和呕吐，亦舒缓绞痛。

sentences.english: Clinical observation on effect of Leis Danshen Tablets in treating patients with angina pectoris;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察综合康复治疗冠心病心绞痛患者的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the clinical and angiographical characteristics of patients with postprandial angina.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨餐后心绞痛临床及冠脉病变的特点。

sentences.english: Objective To study the analgesia of renal colic.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肾绞痛的止痛方法。

sentences.english: At the same time, colic urolithiasis could be managed by ureteroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 同时输尿管镜可对绞痛性尿石作即刻有效处理。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the difference of risk factors between angina cordis and myocardial infarct.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨心绞痛与心肌梗塞相关危险因素的差异。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the clinical curative effect of Shenhua Capsule on coronary heart disease angina pectoris.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察参花胶囊治疗冠心病心绞痛的临床疗效。

definition: to throb with pain/throbbing pain/twang/pang/CL:陣|阵[zhen4]
